version_description:
* Support application/x-www-form-urlencoded structed editing
* Support .har, .p4thor exporting
* Bug fixes

* Support application/x-www-form-urlencoded structed editing
* Support .har, .p4thor exporting
* Bug fixes

* Support application/x-www-form-urlencoded structed editing
* Support .har, .p4thor exporting
* Bug fixes

* Support request policy: delay, repeat, pipelining, etc
* Add Utilities: Encode, Cryptology, RegEx Validator, SSL inspector, etc
* SSL inspector in action extension: https certificates inspecting
* Recored request errors:records item detail > Summary> Memo
* Bug fixes & performance improves

* Support request policy: delay, repeat, pipelining, etc
* Add Utilities: Encode, Cryptology, RegEx Validator, SSL inspector, etc
* SSL inspector in action extension: https certificates inspecting
* Recored request errors:records item detail > Summary> Memo
* Bug fixes & performance improves

* Support request policy: delay, repeat, pipelining, etc
* Add Utilities: Encode, Cryptology, RegEx Validator, SSL inspector, etc
* SSL inspector in action extension: https certificates inspecting
* Recored request errors:records item detail > Summary> Memo
* Bug fixes & performance improves

# Request building
* Support cookie, redirection switch in request policy
* Support unicode domains in request building
* Display unicode domains correctly in request records
* Add Utilities entry in request building
* Deal with HTTP redirection

# Utilities & tools
* Add Date formatter tool: date convert
* Add String Encoding tool
* Add String/HTML escaping tool
* Add IDN encoding for unicode domains（Punnycode）
* Add encryption mode: CFB, CFB8, OFB, CTR
* Add hash: md2, md4, crc32, crc32b, adler32
* Add encryptor: cast-128, rc2
* Add quoted-printable encoding tool
* Encryption compatible with crypto.js api
* Support string encoding in URL Encoding
* Improve Native > ascii encoding
* Improve SSL inspector
* Bug fixed for regular expression validator 
* Bug fixed for hash unicode strings

* bug fixes & performance improves

# Request building
* Support cookie, redirection switch in request policy
* Support unicode domains in request building
* Display unicode domains correctly in request records
* Add Utilities entry in request building
* Deal with HTTP redirection

* Add encryptor: cast-128, rc2
* Add quoted-printable encoding tool
* Encryption compatible with crypto.js api
* Support string encoding in URL Encoding
* Improve Native > ascii encoding
* Improve SSL inspector
* Bug fixed for regular expression validator 
* Bug fixed for hash unicode strings

* bug fixes & performance improves

* bug fixes & performance improves

* add privacy policy: home > about > Privacy Policy
* add request policy entry in home page
* add HTTP methods entry in hame page
* add Clang warnings entry in hame page
* add Common service status entry in hame page
* add HTTP status code entry in hame page
* add carrier information in Monitor
* add battery information in Monitor
* add UUID generator in Utilities
* add fetch type for request record: record detail > Overview > Response Source

* support request records batch exporting
* support TLS Version selection in request policy

* improve large text input performance in Utilities
* optimize exporting file names in Utilities
* improve large response body text loading performance

* crash fixed for SSL Inspector
* bug fixed for regular expression validator
* fix request policy deleting error
* fix bug for string escaping tool
* fix ascii > native error
* fix User-Agent updating never work
* fix crash on 32 bit devices
* fix crash for resoure file deleting in resource pool
* fix har file importing error
* fix request records exporting error
* fix importing files into Anubis error
* fix output file type setting not work in tools
* fix inspecting SSL certificate error with nonstandard https url
* other bug fixes and performance improves

* relpay all records in a task: task > set a request policy > replay all
* tap "Method name" in a record to quicklook the request/response body
* add file picker to text input area in all tools
* output as upper or lower case in "hash tool"
* highlight white space in text input area
* improve SSL certificate inspector & exporting

* fix keyboard layout in input area
* fix replay fails with HTTP/2 headers
* fix tools with empty input for next step 
* fix URLEncode tool 
* fix URLEncoded body with "+" as a space
* fix input text changes never saved
* fix response lost for imported records
* crash fixed for empty record deleting

* add accuracy settings for Date Formatter

* add NSString.hash for Hash/Digest tool

* add "Export Text", "Copy" for Utilities output

* performance improves of huge files for Hash/Digest tool

* fix record > detail may be blank after swiping tab
* fix Surge records importing
* other bug fixes & performance improves

* display CPU/Time cost for regular expression debugging in RegEx Validator
- tap "CPU/Time cost" area to show the cost analysis.
- alarm clock icon: CPU clock
- normal clock icon: time duration

* improves for RegEx Validator
- Export matched results as JSON/Array
- Open single matched result in Ultilities
- Open replaced result in Ultilities

* Export OpenSSL command for HTTPS request records in:
- record detail > overview/request > link
- record detail > SSL/TLS version

* add "SSL Certificate" in "record > Request Detail > overview"
* add pastedboard entries for file/text picker in tools
* editing improves for URL, headers, text body when "build/edit api"
* improves for "key & iv" input in cypto tools
* improves for "replacement" input in RegEx tool
* improves for record overview (SSL version, SSL cipher, source ip, destination ip) on iOS 13+
* support searching for tasks in API
* support reorder tabs of record detail in "About > Request Detail > reorder"
* GUI improves for iPad
* improve records exporting

* fix url end up with "/" missing the last "/"
* bug fixes for building ipv6 requests
* bug fixed for dark mode
* bug fixed for request building

* other bug fixes & performance improves

* improves for iOS 14
* support Context Menu on iOS 13+
* improves for iPad GUI
* support "copy" with Context Menu for static text in label
* support drag files into App on iPad
* receive p4thor/har file with AirDrop 
* support build API with picking files
* support hex slash string unescaping (e.g. "\x31\x30")

* fix GUI blocked with POST multipart/form-data requesting
* fix request body missing after editing
* fix attatched file in requst body lost, when openned in next time
* fix contents missing in Service Status
* fix UI errors of API building
* fix capture group ($1 ~ $9) in RegEx tool not working
* bug fixed for black splash in replacement may disappeared after replaced in RegEx tool
* fix localized string missing 
* crash fixed for file picking on iOS 9
